Tasty Roti : Rice Flour Roti : Breakfast Recipe: South India Duration : 30 mins Servings: 6Â  Rice flour is made out of rice, often used in South Indian dishes and you can prepare many recipes out of it such as snacks and breakfast recipes. Any kind of dish prepared with rice flour is delicious and tasty ðŸ˜‹Â . How you can make them delicious is by adding spices, roasted peanuts and veggies to it. Today I prepared a next version to Akki roti / tapilintu/ Roti roti which I posted before. So what's Make special in this breakfast recipe is I added grated bottle Gourd which gives more taste to your roti and crispness with nice aroma. You believe or not I made this recipe without water. Let's see how i prepared. Nutrition facts: Rice Flour: Vitamin : B6 Minerals : calcium, iron , potassium & magnesium Bottle Gourd: Vitamins: C Minerals: Calcium, magnesium & potassium Cumin seeds: Vitamin : A Minerals : calcium, iron , potassium & magnesium Sesame seeds: Vitamin : B6 Minerals : calcium, iron , potassium & magnesium Peanuts : Vitamin : B6 Minerals : calcium, iron , potassium & magnesium Coriander leaves: Vitamins: A & C Let's start with Ingredients and follows Procedure 1 cup = 160 gms Ingredients: Rice flour - 2 cups Grated Bottle Gourd - 1 cup Grated carrot - 1/2 cup Onion - 1 -Â  Chopped - 1/2 cup Coriander leaves - chopped - 1/4 cup Jeera/cumin seeds Â - 1 tbsp Sesame seeds - 1/2 tbsp - white/ Black Salt - 1 tsp Roasted peanuts powder - 2 tbsp Green chilies - paste - 6 - ground Oil - 1/4 cup Procedure:
  • In a deep bowl add all ingredients
  • Squeeze and mix well, don't add water because Water extracts from grated bottle gourd ( if you are using less quantity of bottle gourd then you should add water, as required to the dough)
  • Make smooth dough till incorporated
  • Divide it into equal balls
  • Apply oil on a butter paper
  • Place a ball on it and press with hand to make the round shape
  • Heat a skillet pan over medium heat
  • Slowly flip the butter paper on the pan
  • After half min slowly remove the butter paper
  • Apply oil and close with lid
  • Take out lid after one minute
  • Cook both sides equally by applying oil
  • Cook roti till golden brown
  • Serve these roti's hot in breakfast/ evening with fresh curd or pickle or onion
  • Enjoy your day & Happy Cooking ðŸ˜Š
